OOC: I have no idea.  The council has considered everyone who is having 
trouble with limting their chars.  If you absolutely positively cna't get rid 
of any chars, there are some regulations that you must follow.  They will be 
posted in the rules section as soon as posible.

--part1_84.15827623.28261fea_boundary
